title: [Large-Scale] Strengthening Teacher Leadership Through Understanding Sexual Minorities: Social Inclusion Workshop Based on Learning Labs

context.prior_knowledge: Basic educational administration experience and understanding of school environments, foundational knowledge of multicultural and gender-equality education
context.additional_context: For corporate training managers or school administrators, this program develops practical tools for creating LGBTQ+-inclusive educational environments. Explores cultural and institutional improvement plans in historical and sociological contexts within educational settings.

learning_goals: Participants analyze three classroom scenarios reflecting LGBTQ+ studentsâ€™ experiences and propose response strategies addressing social relationships and rights protection.
In collaborative learning environments, learners develop one gender-sensitivity education resource based on peer feedback and design inclusive educational approaches for civic competency.
Applying Learning Labs methodology, learners lead case-based discussions and derive actionable improvements for educational systems.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
